did.abstract: Collection includes a letter to Eleazer Lord in New York City regarding Indian affairs and recently published articles concerning Native Americans. Evarts also mentioned Theodore Frelinghuysen and his involvement in the debate over the removal of the Cherokee and other Southern tribes from their homelands. Collection also includes letter from Evarts to his daughter in Richmond, Va. chiefly concerning his upcoming travel arrangements.

bioghist.p: Jeremiah Evarts was a lawyer and philanthropist.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection includes a letter to Eleazer Lord in New York City regarding Indian affairs and recently published articles concerning Native Americans. Evarts also mentioned Theodore Frelinghuysen and his involvement in the debate over the removal of the Cherokee and other Southern tribes from their homelands. Collection also includes letter from Evarts to his daughter in Richmond, Va. chiefly concerning his upcoming travel arrangements.
